content: P Universal diamond cup wheel Standard diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Stable grinding speed – the higher concentration of abrasive diamonds helps the cup wheel to run smoothly at a constant speed Upgraded lifetime – more abrasive diamonds per segment contributes to longer-lasting cup wheels Advanced cooling – patented cooling pins help to prevent damage to the cup wheel segments due to overheating Robust – these cup wheels are built from the highest-grade materials using durable contact welding Minimized vibration – every cup wheel is individually checked and balanced before leaving the plant Applications Grinding concrete and natural stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder, Concrete grinder DGH 130 | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2238591 - Diamond cup DG-CW 125/5 P (2) univ - Package Size 2 pc
